name: Screw!
description:
*Concept

Have you ever dreamed cruise on your own boat? Here you can ride your own boat, with some broken screws.

Control your screws by handle, and gain the most points!

+Full window recommended.

*Play

You can move your boat by manipulating the handles on the left.

Becareful not to crash with the reefs. They will break your screws.

Also, always take care of your remaining oils.

Fixing tools will help you fix the broken screws.

To restart, press 'R'.

Enjoy your journey!

*Some errors found. They will be updated soon.
